title: This is a test post
description: This is a short description of the post.
contents:
Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing, native to the web.
Learn more about using Distill at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.
Here’s a demo of some R code written in an R Markdown chunk:


library(dplyr)

table <- mtcars %>% 
  group_by(cyl) %>% 
  summarise(
    across(
      disp:wt, 
      ~mean(., na.rm = TRUE)
    )
  )

knitr::kable(table)

disp

title: Welcome to rostrum.blog
description:
Welcome to our new blog, rostrum.blog. We hope you enjoy 
reading what we have to say!
